metadata.title: CVE-2021-45942 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: OpenEXR 3.1.x before 3.1.4 has a heap-based buffer overflow in Imf_3_1::LineCompositeTask::execute (called from IlmThread_3_1::NullThreadPoolProvider::addTask and IlmThread_3_1::ThreadPool::addGlobalTask). NOTE: db217f2 may be inapplicable.

criterions.comment: openexr package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
